metadata.title: CVE-2023-34194 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: StringEqual in TiXmlDeclaration::Parse in tinyxmlparser.cpp in TinyXMLthrough 2.6.2 has a reachable assertion (and application exit) via acrafted XML document with a '\0' located after whitespace.

criterions.comment: tinyxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
